‎那是便便出来的地方

translation.en: This is too little for things to go in.
translation.zh: ‎这个洞太小了 东西塞不进去

translation.en: There's only one hole where things can actually go up in there.
translation.zh: ‎只有一个洞可以塞进去东西

translation.en: And that's where your tampon goes,
where the baby comes out, where the sperm goes in.
translation.zh: ‎宝宝从这里出来 精子从这里进去

translation.en: A lot of things go on with that hole.
That's the middle hole.
As these changes start to occur,
not only will boys look at you differently,
translation.zh: ‎不仅男生看你们的眼光会变

translation.en: but men will look at you differently.
And they'll do things that make you uncomfortable,
translation.zh: ‎他们会做一些让你们不舒服的事

translation.en: and when they do, you come to me.
Okay? Does everybody understand that?
Yeah.
[Coach Jean] Okay.
[girls] …six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven…
[Coach Jean] Hi, girls.
Hi, sweetie pie. I missed you.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 小可爱 我很想你 ‎（泰伊）

translation.en: -Me, too. I made you something from camp. -Oh, yeah?
translation.zh:
‎-我也想你 我给你做了一个礼物
‎-是吗？

translation.en: [Tai] I think it'll go on your keychain. I have to find it.
translation.zh:
‎我想将它挂在你的钥匙链上
‎我必须找到它

translation.en: [Coach Jean] So your mother took you for an MRI?
translation.zh: ‎你妈妈带你去拍核磁共振了？

translation.en: -That's an X-ray, right? -Sort of like an X-ray.
translation.zh:
‎-就是X光 对吧？
‎-和X光差不多

translation.en: -Yeah. -What did they say?
The bone right here is separated from my knee.
translation.zh: ‎这里的骨头跟膝盖分开了 ‎（瑞恩）

translation.en: -Yeah. -Like that.
It's a growing thing, right?
translation.zh: ‎是因为你在长个子 对吧？

translation.en: 'Cause I see you're taller than me now.
Yes, I am.
And that wasn't the way it was at the beginning of the summer.
translation.zh: ‎这个夏初 你还没我高呢

translation.en: I told you.
-I hate that. -I was gonna be taller than you.
You did. I didn't think you were gonna grow.
translation.zh: ‎你确实说过 我还以为你长不高了呢

translation.en: -Thought you were gonna be shorty doo-wop. -Well…
translation.zh:
‎-还以为你会变成小矮子呢
‎-这个嘛…

translation.en: And what did he say you have to do? Did they give you exercises…
translation.zh: ‎医生叫你怎么做？有没有让你锻炼…

translation.en: -[Rainn] Yeah. -…or are you going to PT?
[Rainn] They gave me exercises and I'm going to PT,
translation.zh: ‎他们让我锻炼 还要做理疗

translation.en: and I feel like I'm gonna be so out of shape when I start running again.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉等我再次跑步的时候
‎我的体型会走样

translation.en: Forever out of shape.
No, not forever 'cause you're so young.
translation.zh: ‎不会永远 因为你还年轻

translation.en: -But first we got to get you well again. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-但我们必须先让你康复
‎-是的

translation.en: You're going to miss out cross-country season, but…
translation.zh: ‎你将缺席越野跑赛季 不过…

translation.en: But that's… That's my…
[Coach Jean] I know, your best season,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 你状态最佳的赛季

translation.en: but I'd rather you miss out one cross-country season
translation.zh: ‎但我宁愿你缺席一个越野跑赛季

translation.en: and run through your 20s
translation.zh: ‎这样运动生涯能持续到20多岁

translation.en: -than try to keep running on it. -Yeah.
When you come back, you're going to be ready.
translation.zh: ‎等你回来时 你会做好准备的

translation.en: Not going to put you out there until you're ready. Don't worry.
translation.zh:
‎我不会让你没准备好就上场的
‎别担心

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
Give me a hug.
-I missed you. -[Rainn] Missed you, too.
-Okay. -Gonna go back out.
Stay over here and help us with some of the kids.
translation.zh: ‎别走 帮我们训练一下这些孩子

translation.en: Show them how to do the exercises correctly.
[Coach Karel] Yeah, this is good.
-[Coach Jean] Keep your head down. -[Coach Karel] Run all the way through.
[Coach Jean] Thank you. Keep coming.
-[Coach Karel] 6:18. 6:19. 6:20. -[Coach Jean] Good job.
-[Coach Karel] 6:21. -You know how to do it?
The other one.
This one goes up while that one goes up.
translation.zh: ‎这条胳膊抬起来时 抬这条腿

translation.en: Ready?
Okay, like this.
Other one.
Now put it down.
Now lift the other one up.
And now jump.
Yeah, like that.
[Coach Karel] 6:21.
[Rainn sighing] There's a good side and a bad side to it.
translation.zh: ‎停赛有好的一面 也有不好的一面

translation.en: I could focus on my schoolwork. Like, only my schoolwork.
translation.zh: ‎我现在可以专心念书了 心无旁骛

translation.en: I'll be going to high school,
and I'll have to do a lot more work than I did in middle school,
translation.zh: ‎高中的功课比初中繁重多了

translation.en: and it's going to be hard, I know that.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 到时候会很辛苦

translation.en: But I know if I don't work hard
translation.zh: ‎但我知道 如果我不用功

translation.en: then I'll be regretting every one of my decisions.
translation.zh: ‎我就会后悔我做过的每一个决定

translation.en: [woman narrating] …like an amoeba, relies on its cell membrane…
translation.zh:
‎…阿米巴虫依赖它的细胞膜… ‎（瑞恩和泰伊开始上八年级了
‎这是初中的最后一年）

translation.en: Joshua, I heard what Kaden asked you.
translation.zh: ‎约书亚 我听到卡登问你的问题了

translation.en: You hear me?
Excuse me. I cannot hear Taylor.
translation.zh: ‎安静 我听不清泰勒说话

translation.en: There's other people that was talking, too.
Don't worry about the others. Worry about yourself.
-Okay. -Worry about yourself.
-[Tai] First of all-- -[friend] And say what?
[Tai] We were talking about high school. I said I was gonna miss him.
translation.zh: ‎我们聊到读高中的事 我说我会想他

translation.en: So I hugged Lavon and Nikit.
translation.zh: ‎于是我拥抱了拉翁和尼基特

translation.en: And 'cause I said, "I'm gonna miss you guys,"
then he got mad. He was like, "Oh, wow." And then--
translation.zh: ‎他就生气了 他说：“哇” 然后…

translation.en: [friend] You could've said you'd miss him, too.
I did! And he was like, fake hug.
translation.zh: ‎我说了！他毫无诚意地抱了抱我

translation.en: [Tai] I need to talk to you.
[boy] Why?
-[Tai] Because it's important. -[boy] What?
[Tai] Is he mad at me?
-[boy] Who? -[Tai] Joshua.
-Why isn't he talking to me? -[boy] He don't want to.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么他不理我？
‎-他不想理你

translation.en: [Tai] What do you mean? What do you mean he doesn't want to?
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？什么叫他不想理我？

translation.en: -I don't know why he don't. -You…
[friend 1] You're so obsessed.
I'm not obsessed.
[friend 2] Yeah.
[friend 2] I'm gonna have to make sure she stays far away.
[friend 1] Give him space.
[friend 2] Give him some space, bro.
He needs space from you, literally.
[friend 1] He's going to think of you as clingy and so annoying. He's gonna have…
translation.zh: ‎他会觉得你又黏人又烦人 他会…

translation.en: [girls] Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
[Coach Jean] Tai, we need to speak to you over here.
translation.zh: ‎泰伊 过来 我们需要和你谈谈

translation.en: Do you know what we want to speak to you about?
Yeah.
-[Coach Jean] Huh? -Yes.
[Coach Jean] About what?
About my behavior.
[Coach Jean] Specifically what?
Me throwing a crayon at my teacher.
[Coach Jean] What happened?
[Tai] She went around the class, embarrassing me,
translation.zh: ‎她在教室里走来走去 羞辱我

translation.en: saying that my question was wrong, and then--
[Coach Karel] So how would that embarrass you that you got a question wrong?
translation.zh: ‎说你答错题 这怎么是羞辱你呢？

translation.en: Because she went around the class making…
She went around the class and told people that I got it wrong,
translation.zh:
‎她在教室里走来走去
‎跟大家说我答错了

translation.en: and then of course Aliana said I was stupid.
translation.zh: ‎然后当然了 艾莉娜说我笨

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] Okay-- -And the whole class laughed at me.
-I know it's not comfortable. -Then what happened?
translation.zh:
‎-我知道这让你觉得不舒服
‎-然后呢？

translation.en: Then I threw a crayon at her.
-[Coach Karel] Okay, if I'm your teacher-- -I didn't mean--
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 如果我是你的老师…
‎-我不是故意…

translation.en: Don't tell me what you didn't mean.
If I'm a teacher and I'm standing here, how far were you from her?
translation.zh:
‎如果我是老师 我站在这里
‎当时你离她有多远？

translation.en: -A little behind the window. -[Coach Karel] And it hit her?
translation.zh:
‎-比那扇窗户远一点
‎-蜡笔打到她了吗？

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] Where? -On the knee.
Okay. If you had thrown that crayon,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 如果你扔出去的蜡笔

translation.en: and it hit her in the eye,
you wouldn't be here,
'cause there's a place for kids who do that.
translation.zh: ‎因为有个地方专门收留这种孩子

translation.en: You have a right to get angry.
Everybody does.
It's how you deal with it.
And I know that you don't always deal with your anger in the correct way,
translation.zh: ‎我知道你有时会处理不好愤怒情绪

translation.en: because at no point in your life
should you ever
attempt to assault a teacher
or anybody else.
They have a school full of students
who have assaulted an adult,
and they got labelled, and they got put there.
translation.zh: ‎他们被贴上标签 被送去那里

translation.en: [Coach Jean] And now you're one of them.
Is that what you want for yourself?
We're so disappointed in you.
We're so disappointed,
and we talked it over and we decided
translation.zh: ‎我们商量过了 我们决定

translation.en: that we're going to give you consequences here,
even if you don't have consequences at school.
So you're going to be suspended from the team for a while.
translation.zh: ‎田径队将暂停你的训练和比赛

translation.en: You'll be able to come back outdoor season,
but your indoor season is done.
You understand?
-Yes. -[Coach Jean] Okay.
Put your stuff on.
[Tai] I'm sitting here with nothing to do.
But you know what I do when I'm by myself?
translation.zh: ‎知道我独处的时候喜欢干什么吗？

translation.en: I love looking at nature, and I like how the sun hits the snow.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢凝望大自然
‎喜欢阳光洒在雪地上的样子

translation.en: It glimmers sometimes. It looks really pretty.
translation.zh: ‎有时会闪着微光 美极了

translation.en: Most of the time I'm just here.
translation.zh: ‎大多数时候我只是待在这里

translation.en: Being annoyed by my sisters and Mom sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎有时被妹妹和妈妈搞得心烦意乱

translation.en: Just never get to do anything.
My life's simple.
Go to school, some track, go home, get ready for the next day.
translation.zh:
‎上学、练田径、回家
‎为第二天做准备

translation.en: And now that I have nothing to do… I don't have a phone or anything.
translation.zh: ‎现在我无所事事…也没有手机什么的

translation.en: What am I gonna do?
My life sucks right now.
Life sucks.
[Ms. Diann] How you feeling, Tonia?
[Tonia] Oh, so good.
Just knowing what's about to happen, I'm feeling good.
translation.zh: ‎知道即将发生的事 我觉得很开心

translation.en: Three times I've been in a relationship and lost myself in it.
translation.zh: ‎我有过三段感情 最后都迷失了自己

translation.en: The reason I will not do it with these girls
translation.zh: ‎现在带着三个女儿 我不想谈感情

translation.en: is because I know I will lose myself in it.
I know I will.
[Ms. Diann] Yes, you may attract some of the same things,
translation.zh: ‎没错 也许你总是吸引同一类男人

translation.en: but your tolerance level change.
translation.zh: ‎但你的容忍度会改变 ‎（黛安女士 朋友）

translation.en: -Not mine. -It does.
Yes, it would, Tonia.
I'm not going there because I know that that's my weakness.
translation.zh:
‎我不会去谈恋爱
‎因为我知道这是我的弱点

translation.en: That's why I'm single. I'm scared to tread those waters.
translation.zh: ‎所以我保持单身 我不敢趟这个浑水

translation.en: When I raise these girls and they're well on their way,
translation.zh:
‎等我把女儿养大了
‎她们都过上好日子了

translation.en: -I'll get in a relationship. -That's something different.
translation.zh:
‎-那时候我再谈恋爱
‎-那不一样

translation.en: [Tonia] I just don't want them to see me all blushy-eyed and, like, all in love.
translation.zh:
‎我不想让她们见到我
‎热恋时陶醉的样子

translation.en: I just can't.
I've been the strong woman forever in their life.
translation.zh:
‎在她们的人生中
‎我一直是一个坚强的女人

translation.en: And I think that when I do fall in love,
translation.zh: ‎我担心一旦我爱上了某个人

translation.en: it takes me over, you know?
That's why I was never probably good at it.
translation.zh:
‎也许这就是
‎我一直不擅长谈恋爱的原因吧

translation.en: It just takes over.
You know, I see it in them, too.
They got all my qualities when it comes to love.
translation.zh: ‎在感情方面 我有的缺点她们全有

translation.en: Oh, it's disgusting.
So I'll wait until they're out the house, you know,
translation.zh: ‎所以我要等到她们自立门户

translation.en: so I can have my moment.
A big part of me is closed.
I fight against that daily, you know.
I fight it, um…
Yeah.
I think that, um…
I don't want to be like this.
Life has made me like that.
The worst has happened.
You know?
I lost a child.
The worst has happened.
I think their road is paved in blessings,
so I trust that.
They are my fresh start.
I needed my second chance to be successful
translation.zh: ‎我需要再次得到成功的机会

translation.en: 'cause I felt I was blessed to be given a second chance.
translation.zh: ‎能够拥有第二次机会 这是我的福分

translation.en: [Brooke] Mom said that when he died, his soul went into me,
translation.zh:
‎妈妈说哥哥死的时候
‎他的灵魂进入了我的身体

translation.en: because she said I walk like him, I talk like him, I act like him.
translation.zh:
‎她说我走路像他
‎说话像他 行为也像他

translation.en: I always have to accept the fact that he's in a better place now,
translation.zh:
‎一直以来 我不得不接受一个事实
‎就是他去了更好的地方

translation.en: and I have to continue with my life.
I can't always be sad.
I have to be happy and… think of him.
translation.zh: ‎我必须快乐 同时…想着他

translation.en: [Tonia] The decision to raise these three on my own
came straight from my experience with an abusive relationship.
I got through a lot of things in my life some people just don't survive.
translation.zh:
‎我一生经历过很多不幸
‎换个人也许根本活不下来

translation.en: So I'm just fighting my way out, you know?
[Brooke] My mom, she's gone through a lot.
And she can share challenges with me
and make me realize what type of world I live in and how to deal with it.
translation.zh:
‎让我认清我活在怎样一个世界
‎学会与这个世界打交道

translation.en: [Coach Karel] When does their apartment payment stop?
translation.zh: ‎他们交的房租什么时候到期？

translation.en: it should be in April.
Maybe he forgot and just keeps paying it.
translation.zh: ‎也许他忘了 还会继续交

translation.en: -[both laughing] -That'd be good for her.
-I'm sure-- -She has to learn to manage her own money.
-[Coach Karel] That's why you need to-- -[Coach Jean] I have to speak to her.
Yeah. Don't want her to end up back in the shelter.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 不想见到她回到收容所

translation.en: Because that happens so fast for people.
translation.zh: ‎很多人很快又回到了收容所

translation.en: Yeah.
Especially when you have three kids.
-Three growing kids. -Yeah.
They need everything.
Didn't I say no roughhousing on the ice?
translation.zh: ‎我说过 不要在冰面上打闹

translation.en: You, get off.
[Coach Jean] Did you fill out the thing for public high schools?
translation.zh: ‎你填写公立高中的申请资料了吗？

translation.en: I plan to go to a specialized high school, but I have to wait for the results.
translation.zh:
‎我打算上专业高中
‎但我必须等待录取结果

translation.en: -When do the results come in? -Like, March.
translation.zh:
‎-录取结果什么时候出来？
‎-三月份

translation.en: March? I didn't know it was that long.
Yeah. The test even said--
You took the test already?
-How do you think you did? -I think I did good.
translation.zh:
‎-考得怎么样？
‎-我觉得考得不错

translation.en: I answered all the questions.
-You did well? -Yeah.
Good.
Well, we'll see. I mean, if you get into a specialized high school,
translation.zh: ‎那就等结果吧 要是能上专业高中

translation.en: I would want you to go there.
Yeah.
If not, I would want you to go to St. Joseph's.
translation.zh: ‎如果不行 我希望你上圣约瑟夫高中

translation.en: -St. Joseph's? -It's a good school.
Okay, guys, this is how you do it. You take…
translation.zh: ‎好吧 各位 方法是这样的 用…

translation.en: -Let me just put this upright. -[Rainn] What the hell, Tai?
translation.zh:
‎-等我把摄像头弄好
‎-搞什么 泰伊？

translation.en: Take two hands.
Put them near the pimple, not on it, but near it.
translation.zh:
‎把手指放在粉刺旁边
‎不要放在上面 而是旁边

translation.en: And you're going to squeeze! [laughs hysterically]
[Rainn laughing hysterically] Tai, you're so gross.
I'm gonna sing a song. What song should I sing?
translation.zh: ‎我要唱一首歌 唱什么歌好呢？

translation.en: It's hard to run because you have to meet people's expectations.
translation.zh:
‎跑步很难
‎因为你必须达到别人的期望

translation.en: Even if you're injured, you have to run really fast
translation.zh: ‎就算受了伤 你还是必须拼命冲刺

translation.en: because if you don't
then everyone looks like they're not proud of you or something.
translation.zh: ‎（瑞恩） ‎…别人就不会为你感到骄傲

translation.en: Sometimes any sport is too much pressure for people,
translation.zh:
‎有时候 任何体育项目
‎都有人觉得压力太大

translation.en: so they just don't do sports.
I like the adrenaline, but not the pressure.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢紧张刺激 但我不喜欢压力

translation.en: [Dr. Goldstein] All righty.
translation.zh: ‎（马克戈德斯坦医生 脊椎按摩师） ‎好

translation.en: How much pain you got today?
None.
-You have none? -Hmm?
-No pain? -No.
-Knees good? -Yeah.
Straight. Straight. Straight. Up, up, up. Beautiful.
[Rainn] She's, um, a sprinter?
[Dr. Goldstein] Yes. She's got five gold medals.
Diane Dixon. All gold.
-Really? -Yep.
-[Dr. Goldstein] That's right. -[Rainn] Wow.
[Coach Jean] 1975 was the first year for the Colgate Women's Games.
translation.zh:
‎1975年首次举办了
‎高露洁女子田径赛

translation.en: And the reason that the Colgate Games started
is because back in the '70s,
there wasn't a lot of opportunity for female athletes.
The boys had everything.
What's the big thing about Colgate? Why do we push you so hard? Adelia?
translation.zh:
‎为什么说高露洁田径赛很重要？
‎我们为何要逼着你们苦练？阿黛丽娅

translation.en: [Adelia] Because the winner gets scholarship money.
You get scholarship money for school.
How many of you going to college?
Absolutely.
And even though a full scholarship will go far,
translation.zh: ‎虽然全额奖学金能承担大部分开销

translation.en: you're still going to need incidentals.
Like, "Oh, wow, they're paying my room and board."
translation.zh:
‎比如“哇 他们将支付
‎我的住宿费和伙食费

translation.en: "I might have to buy books."
So that Colgate money could be used toward your books,
translation.zh: ‎高露洁的奖学金就可以用来买书

translation.en: and then you have extra money. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎让你们还能剩下一些钱 懂吗？

translation.en: I received Colgate money for ten years.
translation.zh: ‎我领过十年的高露洁奖学金

translation.en: The ten years I ran the Colgate Games.
translation.zh: ‎就是我参加高露洁田径赛那十年

translation.en: All right? So, this weekend,
remember, do the best you can.
-No punks out there. Understand? -[all] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-不许惹是生非 知道吗？
‎-知道了

translation.en: Have a good night.
[Coach Jean] My coach, Fred Thompson,
he started the Colgate Women's Games.
translation.zh: ‎是他创办了高露洁女子田径赛

translation.en: It was his idea, really, to put women in the forefront
translation.zh: ‎是他提出来让女人走上… ‎（高露洁女子田径赛）

translation.en: of track and field.
He was a pioneer in that respect.
He wanted women to get the opportunity to go to college
and through track and field he did that.
translation.zh: ‎通过田径运动 他实现了这个愿望

translation.en: One, two, three.
[all] Jeuness!

Ready? Goodbye.

‎我本来就很酷

‎如果我把你们放在

‎要想参加全国赛
‎今天就必须拿出信心

translation.en: That means you have to run your best times
and jump your best jumps
and do whatever you got to do to get in.
I don't care if you're in the 100 or the 3,000 on the last straightaway.
translation.zh:
‎不管最后一段直道
‎是100米还是3000米

translation.en: How's your face gonna look?
God, give my girls strength and speed and let them run what they can really run.
translation.zh:
‎上帝 请赐予她们力量和速度
‎让她们发挥出自己的实力

translation.en: -One, two, three. -[all] Jeuness!
[announcer] On your mark.
Brookie!
[Rainn] Come on, Brooke!
[Coach Jean] That's it, Brookie!
Come on, Brookie!
Brooke has run much better.
translation.zh: ‎布鲁克的成绩比平时好多了

translation.en: [interviewer] Are you nervous now?
Do you want to go to the Nationals?
I guess.
[Coach Jean] You know, she's got the teenage blues.
translation.zh: ‎她染上了青春期常见的忧郁情绪

translation.en: [announcer] On your mark.
Set…
[Coach Jean] Run a good stretch!
She can run.
She's not going to let it go just like that.
[loudly] Come on!
Come on!
Come on, you can't wait till the last lap!
translation.zh: ‎快点 不要等到最后一圈才发力！

translation.en: -You can't wait! -[Coach Jean] Come on, girl. You can do it. Good!
translation.zh:
‎-不能等！
‎-加油 姑娘 你可以的 很好！

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Get 'em, Tai!
[Coach Jean] Come on!
[Coach Karel] Go get 'em, Tai!
Do you know who's gonna come off that relay?
translation.zh: ‎你知道接力赛谁会掉链子吗？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Tai's gonna come off.
She can't run like that at the Nationals. Get eaten up.
translation.zh:
‎到了全国赛上
‎她这样跑可不行 会输得很惨

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Come on!
She's probably going to get booted from that relay,
and Rainn will take her place at the Nationals.
That was bad.
You're down as an alternate now
because you know that won't fly at the Nationals.
translation.zh:
‎你知道 这个成绩
‎在全国赛上肯定不行

translation.en: So we still got time. You're still in the running.
translation.zh: ‎我们还有时间 你还有机会

translation.en: Running is what saves them.
Running is what keeps them focused,
and keeps them listening, and keeps them with a goal, you know?
translation.zh: ‎让她们听话 让她们有一个目标

translation.en: Everybody needs a goal, especially teenage girls. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎每个人都需要有个目标
‎尤其是十多岁的小姑娘

translation.en: [Tai] I'm not a regular kid.
I actually have big opportunities that I could take.
[sighs] And I don't really want to take them.
I like track. I really do.
But I didn't want to run track with this lots of pressure.
translation.zh: ‎但我不想背负如此大的压力练田径

translation.en: But I have a chance to get a full ride for college if I continue track.
translation.zh:
‎但如果继续练田径
‎我就有机会获得大学的全额奖学金

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Tai and I have a good relationship.
She's been begging me for several months
to allow her to stay at the house and train…
and it gives their parents a break.
translation.zh: ‎…这也能让她母亲轻松一阵子

translation.en: Everybody needs a break from a teenage girl.
translation.zh:
‎有十多岁女儿的家长
‎偶尔都需要轻松一下

translation.en: Yes, Tai, especially.
That's not standing. That's laying.
Stand up. Come on. Let me see.
translation.zh: ‎站起来 快点 让我看看

translation.en: She's got a lot of personality.
It can't be contained in a small apartment.
translation.zh: ‎不可能被禁锢在一个小小的公寓里

translation.en: [Tai] I really love Coach Jean.
She raised me in a different way than my mom could.
translation.zh: ‎她教导我的方式和我妈不一样

translation.en: How can I explain it? She just…
She makes me feel special.
She taught me…
even the little obstacles can affect your future.
translation.zh: ‎即便是小小的障碍也会影响我的未来

translation.en: I want this experience to mean something,
translation.zh: ‎我希望这段经历让我有所收获

translation.en: so I can prove that all this was not for nothing.
I'm capable of running really, really fast times.
[Coach Jean] When I was growing up, my grandmother took in foster children.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候 我奶奶领养过很多小孩

translation.en: There were always children in her home that she raised,
translation.zh: ‎她家里总是有她领养的孩子

translation.en: and that's what we were used to, you take care of children.
translation.zh: ‎这让我们养成了照顾孩子的习惯

translation.en: That was ingrained in us.
translation.zh: ‎这个想法在我们心中根深蒂固

translation.en: So, in some small way, I try to do that through the track team.
translation.zh:
‎所以我希望通过田径队
‎贡献自己的微薄之力

translation.en: Take care of kids who have parents,
but they need some extra person in their lives.
I've lost some really talented girls to the street,
translation.zh:
‎我帮助过的一些姑娘很有才华
‎最后还是沦落街头

translation.en: and it's always sad for me,
but I finally had to say to myself,
any one girl that I am able to help is a victory.
translation.zh: ‎只要能帮助一个姑娘 就是胜利

translation.en: Stay here and do your drills.
translation.zh:
‎（泰伊还有最后一次机会 获得
‎全国少年奥运会800米参赛资格） ‎待在这里训练

translation.en: Stay loose, but you know where it's all at, right?
translation.zh:
‎保持放松
‎但你知道重要的是什么 对吧？

translation.en: -In here? -Right there. Yeah.
Still nervous.
Don't even focus on the first quarter,
'cause you know how you go out all hard?
You gotta go fast, but relax.
translation.zh: ‎你得跑快点 但必须放松

translation.en: Focus on the backstretch.
Did you ever see the Nike commercial where she says, "I can do this"?
translation.zh:
‎看过那条耐克广告吗？
‎里面的女主角说“我能行”那条？

translation.en: Yeah.
That's what you got to be singing to yourself.
Just say, "I can do this," and I'll be there screaming. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎说“我能行”
‎我会为你呐喊加油的 好吗？

translation.en: Just keep thinking. What you gonna think?
translation.zh: ‎要一直想着 应该想什么？

translation.en: -I can do this. -"I can do this," 'cause you can. You can.
translation.zh:
‎-我能行
‎-“我能行” 因为你行

translation.en: -You believe it? You gotta believe it. -Mmm-hmm.
Don't matter if I believe it 'cause I'm not gonna be out there catching wig.
translation.zh:
‎我信不信无关紧要
‎因为上场比赛的人不是我

translation.en: Do all the drills you can.
-Okay? -Thanks, Jeannie.
You're welcome.
[woman] Thirteen, fourteen, 800. Good luck to all of you.
translation.zh:
‎13岁和14岁的800米选手
‎祝你们好运

translation.en: Walk down in a straight line. Follow number two.
translation.zh: ‎排成直线走过去 跟着二号选手

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
[Coach Jean] This is good! You can do it!
[Coach Karel] Let's go, girl!
Run the backstretch!
Run the backstretch!
Hard!
Okay.
Yeah, she's won her third and final race.
translation.zh:
‎是的 她赢了第三场
‎也是最后一场比赛

translation.en: [Ms. Diann] I wish I could see you tomorrow.
[Tai] I'll take lots of pictures.
[Ms. Diann] You need stuff?
[Tai] Like earrings?
[Ms. Diann] Yeah, jewelry.
We don't really have earrings because we always lose them.
translation.zh: ‎我们从来不戴耳环 因为老是弄丢

translation.en: [Ms. Diann] It's prom. You gotta get dressed a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎这可是毕业舞会 必须打扮一下

translation.en: This is a special moment.
Not everyone gets to go because not everybody's graduating.
translation.zh:
‎不是每个人都能参加
‎因为不是每个人都要毕业了

translation.en: I didn't have a prom.
-Really? -[Ms. Diann] In eighth grade?
-They didn't do that stuff. -High school prom?
translation.zh:
‎-学校没办毕业舞会
‎-那高中毕业舞会呢？

translation.en: [Ms. Diann] No, prom, I didn't go to.
[Tai] I would go with you, Ms. Diann, but I have a date.
translation.zh:
‎我很想和你一起去
‎黛安阿姨 但我有舞伴了

translation.en: [Ms. Diann] Who's your date?
Joshua.
Who's Joshua?
♪ Scared to fly ♪
♪ This is the moment when you get free And you let your arms fly ♪
♪ Scared to fly ♪
[announcer] Rainn Sheppard.
[announcer] Tai Sheppard.
Coach Jean! I graduated.
Brookie, did you see how you were ranked for the 3,000?
translation.zh:
‎布鲁克
‎看到你的3000米比赛名次了吗？

translation.en: -Tenth. -Yeah, tenth is a good spot.
translation.zh:
‎-第十名
‎-对 第十名非常不错

translation.en: You just have to move up two spots, see? But that's not what we're trying to do.
translation.zh:
‎你只要再提升两位就行了
‎但这不是我们的目标

translation.en: We're trying to go out there to win.
translation.zh: ‎我们的目标是冠军 对吧？

translation.en: How do I want to see your face at the end?
translation.zh: ‎接近终点时 我想看到你什么表情？

translation.en: Exactly. I want to see you digging at the end.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我希望你
‎在接近终点时拼命冲刺

translation.en: [Brooke] When I first ran, it made me feel happy and it made me feel like something.
translation.zh:
‎第一次参加比赛时
‎我觉得很开心 觉得很有成就感

translation.en: Now I feel as if I have something to do with my life.
translation.zh: ‎现在 我觉得我在主宰自己的未来

translation.en: I have something to work on.
I have a goal.
[announcer] On your marks.
[Coach Jean] Come on, Brookie.
Come on! Come on! Come on!
Wind sprints, Brookie! Wind sprints!
translation.zh: ‎呼吸冲刺 布鲁克！呼吸冲刺！

translation.en: Come on, Brooke. Come on. Hold on.
translation.zh: ‎加油 布鲁克 加油 坚持

translation.en: Come on!
Race, Brookie!
[announcer] Brooke Sheppard in third.
translation.zh: ‎布鲁克谢泼德获得了第三名

translation.en: I can't believe she got third! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: ‎我不敢相信她得了第三名 天啊！

translation.en: [presenter] In third place from Brooklyn, New York, Brooke Sheppard.
translation.zh:
‎第三名是来自纽约布鲁克林的
‎布鲁克谢泼德

translation.en: [presenter] Thank you, ladies.
[squeals] Yay, my baby! You did so good.
[Coach Karel] Rainn has a tough task ahead of her today in the 1,500.
translation.zh:
‎瑞恩今天要跑1500米
‎这是个艰巨的任务

translation.en: I'm hopeful, and I'm nervous.
translation.zh: ‎我充满期待 又非常紧张

translation.en: [announcer] Now going into seven…
[Coach Karel] Rainn comes to a track meet to race.
translation.zh: ‎（瑞恩以第四名进入1500米） ‎瑞恩来参加比赛志在争胜

translation.en: That's the difference. Not just to run, she's here to race.
translation.zh:
‎这就是区别所在
‎不只是来跑步 而是来争胜

translation.en: [Rainn] Every day has something to do with the next day.
You can't slack off one day and expect everything you dream for.
translation.zh:
‎你不能懒惰懈怠
‎还希望得到想要的一切

translation.en: Gotta work for your dreams.
They just don't come because you say, "Oh, please come."
translation.zh:
‎不会因为你说“快来吧”
‎梦想就自己实现

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
[Coach Karel] Rainn, let's go! Move up, Rainn! Move up!
translation.zh: ‎瑞恩 加油！快点 瑞恩！快点！

translation.en: Come on, Rainny, come on!
Come on, baby!
Rainny, you're right there!
Come on, Rainny! Come on, Rainn!
Three hundred meters!
Come on now!
Come on, Rainny!
Rainn, go!
Come on, Rainny! Come on, Rainn! Come on!
[announcer] Rainn Sheppard in third.
[Coach Karel] Great race. I can't be mad at her.
[woman] You did amazing.
-Thank you so much. -[woman] Good job.
[Coach Jean] She did everything she could. She did everything she could.
[presenter] In third place, from Naperville, Illinois--
translation.zh: ‎第三名是来自伊利诺伊州内珀维尔…

translation.en: No, no, no.
-[presenter] From Brooklyn, New York… -Yes.
-[presenter] …with a time of 4:49:32… -Yes, baby!
translation.zh:
‎-…成绩为4分49秒的…
‎-好样的 宝贝！

translation.en: [presenter] Rainn Sheppard.
I'm proud of you, though.
I'm proud of myself, too.
-You got one more, okay? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你还有一场比赛 好吗？
‎-嗯

translation.en: I know everyone else talks about how their track team is a family,
translation.zh:
‎我知道 每个人都说
‎自己的田径队亲如一家

translation.en: but my track team is like an actual family,
translation.zh: ‎但我的田径队真的就是一家人

translation.en: and family is everything because it pushes me to be a better person.
translation.zh:
‎家庭就是一切
‎因为它能鞭策我做一个更好的人

translation.en: [Tai] When I'm about to start my race, I'm still very, very nervous.
translation.zh: ‎每次比赛快开始时 我都会非常紧张

translation.en: I'll, like, look to the coaches, maybe,
because I know that if I see somebody that I know supports me, I'll be okay.
translation.zh:
‎因为我知道
‎看到支持我的人 我就会没事

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
[Coach Jean] Up the time!
Up the time! Come on, Tai!
Go with her.
Swing!
Swing! She's right there!
Swing, Tai! Swing!
Hard, Tai! Hard!
She was tired.
She was never relaxed.
I kind of just want to go home right now, because this year is not a good year,
translation.zh: ‎现在我只想回家 因为今年不太顺利

translation.en: like my other years,
but tomorrow, I just hope I do good.
I'm going to stick to the strategy that I have with the 800,
but this time do better, because this is for the team.
translation.zh:
‎但这次我会跑得更好
‎因为这次是为了团队

translation.en: I'm gonna do good.
[Coach Jean] Listen to me carefully,
we came here to win.
Even if you're in second, don't panic,
translation.zh: ‎就算你跑在第二位 也不要慌

translation.en: just go smooth until you catch up, but catch up. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎稳着跑 直到你追上 但一定要追上

translation.en: Because there's always somebody coming behind you.
[announcer] So Swift Athletics coming up on the exchange.
translation.zh: ‎“快跑运动员”队即将来跟大家交流

translation.en: Oh, I'm nervous. It's a relay. They have some good competition in this.
translation.zh:
‎我很紧张 这是接力赛
‎有些对手很强

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Track and field is not a team sport.
Even though you're on a team, when you get on the track,
translation.zh:
‎虽然你有自己的队伍
‎但是当你走上赛场时

translation.en: you get on by yourself and you have to do the work.
translation.zh: ‎你是一个人上场 你必须完成任务

translation.en: You have to get beyond the hurdles that are put before you.
translation.zh: ‎你必须越过摆在你面前的障碍

translation.en: So it makes you strong in spirit
translation.zh: ‎所以它能让你的内心变得强大

translation.en: and that will get them far in life.
translation.zh: ‎这能让她们的人生道路走得更远

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
-[starting shot fires] -[Coach Jean] Get out, Chioma! Come on, Chioma!
That's good!
Go hard! Head down!
Keep your head down!
That's good!
Come on, Maya!
Go, Maya! Hard!
-That's good. -Good. That's good. Good, Tai, good!
translation.zh:
‎-很好
‎-好 很好 泰伊 很好！

translation.en: Come on, Tai!
[Coach Karel] That's good!
Come on, Rainny!
Let's get 'em! Let's get 'em!
Yeah, she's running.
Come on, Rainn!
Let's get 'em!
[presenter] And our gold medal winners with a time of 9:39.06, Jeuness Track Club.
translation.zh:
‎金牌得主为詹内斯田径俱乐部
‎她们的成绩为9分39秒

translation.en: -Yay! -[all cheering]
[Coach Jean] They've accomplished so much.
They're such tremendous athletes, and they don't even realize it yet.
translation.zh:
‎她们是非常优秀的运动员
‎她们自己还没意识到

translation.en: It's going to be a long time before they even process everything that's happened.
translation.zh:
‎要很久以后
‎她们才能完全理解发生的一切

translation.en: You just have to hold your breath and pray that they stay on the right track.
translation.zh: ‎你只能屏住呼吸 祈祷她们一切顺利

translation.en: [Tai] Today is September 3rd, 2019.
Today is an important day.
Because it's the day before school.
And today is when you get to get your hair done,
translation.zh: ‎（泰伊 高一学生） ‎今天要把头发弄好

translation.en: and most importantly get mentally prepared to say goodbye to having fun.
translation.zh:
‎还有更重要的 做好心理准备
‎跟快乐时光说再见

translation.en: I'm just nervous.
I hope that the kids are nice at school, 'cause I'm going to a private school.
translation.zh:
‎我希望同学们好相处
‎因为我上的是私立学校

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not really rich either.
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道 而且我没什么钱

translation.en: Maybe I don't look cool enough.
Today I'm very… nervous.
I don't really want to go to high school.
I mean, I'd like to go back to middle school.
Not only 'cause, like…
Mostly because…
I don't like change all that much.
Change is different,
and I don't know how I'll react to change.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我对改变会有什么反应

translation.en: So, Rainn, it's the day before school.
[Rainn] Oh, no duh.
-How are you feeling? -Great.
Just like any other day.
-Not nervous? -Nope.
What are you looking forward to for the school year?
Um, I'm looking forward to… peace and love.
Okay, will that be all?
[Coach Jean] Tell your mother to take a picture of you and Rainn in your uniform.
translation.zh: ‎让你妈拍一张你和瑞恩穿校服的照片

translation.en: I need a picture in the morning.
Okay.
[Coach Jean] Yeah. So I can see you.
translation.zh: ‎对 这样我才能看到你们

translation.en: Yeah, let's keep up the good work, 'cause…
translation.zh: ‎对 继续好好努力 因为…

translation.en: I just want you to remember, when you're in school,
translation.zh: ‎我只希望你记住 开学以后…

translation.en: before you say something, do something, just think to yourself,
translation.zh:
‎（布鲁克 七年级） ‎…不管你想说什么 做什么
‎都要先想想

translation.en: "Would I do this if Jean was standing next to me?"
translation.zh:
‎“要是吉恩在我旁边
‎我还会这样做吗？”

translation.en: [Coach Jean] "Would I say this if Jean was standing next to me?"
translation.zh:
‎“要是吉恩在我旁边
‎我还会这样说吗？”

translation.en: [Tai chuckles] No.
[Coach Jean] Just say that to yourself, and then you'll be fine.
translation.zh: ‎只要这样想想 你就会没事的

translation.en: I will.
TT.
Tai? Tai?
What time you leaving?
Okay, 7:15 is good.
Rainny, what time are you leaving?
[Tonia] Going through what they went through,
like losing their home, their bedroom,
translation.zh: ‎比如失去住所 失去卧室

translation.en: having to live in a shelter,
then all of a sudden becoming these, like, track stars…
I think this whole thing just made them more aware of life.
translation.zh: ‎我认为这会让她们更加了解生活

translation.en: They're wonderful, and they're still lovable and loving.
translation.zh: ‎她们很棒 她们依然可爱 充满爱心

translation.en: They're, like, just beautiful young ladies.
Little women.
I would describe Tai, Rainn and Brooke as little women.
translation.zh:
‎我会用小妇人来形容
‎泰伊、瑞恩和布鲁克

translation.en: [Coach Jean] They always had that talent deep inside of them,
translation.zh: ‎那份天赋一直蕴藏在她们体内

translation.en: but they needed someone to show them how to use that talent.
translation.zh: ‎但她们需要有人教她们发挥这份天赋

translation.en: And that's what I'm there for.
Bye!
Bye.
As long as they find something that they love, and they work hard at,
translation.zh:
‎只要她们能找到喜欢做的事
‎并且努力去做

translation.en: that's all I can ask.
And now this is the age of the women,
so they're really powerful women…
-[whistling] -…and that will take them far.
[Tai] In your time of need,
just know you're not alone…
because there's always someone there to help you.
Family, friends, people you don't know.
They'll help you along the way.
Then you also have to remember you have to work hard yourself…
translation.zh: ‎你还要记住 你必须努力打拼

translation.en: because this is going to be your future,
and you should make it your own.
translation.zh: ‎你应该打造属于自己的未来

translation.en: So then… I think you have a pretty good life.
translation.zh: ‎然后…我想你会拥有一段美好的人生

translation.en: ♪ They got it, they got it ♪
translation.zh:
‎（被转到了洛夫林主教高中） ‎（泰伊在高一班的成绩稳居前两名
‎并且加入了学校合唱团）

translation.en: ♪ They got it, they got it ♪
translation.zh:
‎（泰伊在高一班的成绩稳居前两名
